mapper.select: SELECT id, password, nickname, name, mobile, state, is_deleted AS isDelete, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM admin_info WHERE mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT id, password, nickname, name, mobile, state, is_deleted AS isDelete, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM admin_info WHERE is_deleted = 0

SELECT id, password, nickname, name, mobile, state, is_deleted AS isDelete, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM admin_info WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT id, password, nickname, name, mobile, state, is_deleted AS isDelete, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM admin_info WHERE id = #{id}
